thread.title: KeepCalling.com Launched a New Personality Test for Expats: Whats Your True Calling?
thread.title_full: KeepCalling.com Launched a New Personality Test for Expats: Whats Your True Calling? - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: KeepCalling.com Launched a New Personality Test for Expats: Whats Your True Calling?
text:
‘What’s Your True Calling’? - KeepCalling.com recently launched a new personality test for expats worldwide revealing strong points they didn’t even know they had.
Atlanta, Georgia (PRWEB) September 26, 2015
KeepCalling.com , an international telecom company providing services to immigrants and ethnic communities around the world, recently launched a personality test for its customers. The test reveals some of the expats’ best inner traits and assets when dealing with other people or with the world at large. It can be found under the name ‘What’s Your True Calling’ and is still available on KeepCalling’s Facebook page.
The quiz will point out the respondents’ secret weapons, their innate personality traits that shine in every situation. Unfortunately, these weapons can sometimes be so secret that people may not even be aware of them.
A series of 9 questions leads to the final answer: a profile that expats best represent. There is a total of 4 typologies employed by KeepCalling, so customers can be Protectors, Explorers, Negotiators, or Directors.
The test has already been taken by hundreds of people worldwide and the results gathered so far show that most of the respondents are Protectors (43%) and have a very soft, protective side. Many are Explorers (37%), meaning they have a curious nature and enjoy exploring, while some of them (15%) are Directors who like to be in control and take matters into their own hands. Only a select few (5%) are talented Negotiators and born peacemakers.
KeepCalling ’s interest in its customers goes beyond its business field and into more general areas, that’s why the company periodically launches contests, quizzes, and campaigns meant to involve expats all over the world.
KeepCalling serves immigrant communities all around the world and provides prepaid solutions for international and national long distance communication. The products offered by KeepCalling.com are Voice Credit (for international calls and SMS), Monthly Plans (offering a high number of minutes for a low monthly fee), Virtual Numbers (a subscription through which customers can receive unlimited calls at local rates), and Mobile Recharge (an international top up service).
Customers are happy both with the quality and with the prices offered by KeepCalling. On Trustpilot, a famous review site, KeepCalling receives constant feedback from its customers and currently has an 8.5 rating.One customer writes, ’Good quality service. Great on the road and at home. Exceptional voice clarity. I recommend KeepCalling to people that want a better calling experience.’
To find out more about KeepCalling.com’s newest campaigns and promotions, customers are invited to visit their blog at blog.keepcalling.com or to follow them on:
Facebook.com/KeepCalling.Fan Twitter.com/KeepCalling Plus.Google.com/+KeepCalling
About KeepCalling.com
KeepCalling.com is an interactive website designed by KeepCalling, a global telecommunications company registered in 2002 in USA. Presently, KeepCalling provides its services to hundreds of thousands of consumers and businesses, with a focus on customer satisfaction. KeepCalling has been listed by Inc 5000 as one of the fastest growing companies in the USA for 5 consecutive years. In 2015 the company registered a revenue increase of over 200% from 2011 to 2014.
